translations.chinese: 戒沛公曰：「旦日不可不早自來謝。」
translations.english: He warned Pei Gong: "Tomorrow morning you must not fail to come early and apologize."

translations.chinese: 項伯還，具以沛公言告羽，因曰：「沛公不先破關中兵，公巨 能入乎？
translations.english: Xiang Bo returned and told Xiang Yu everything Pei Gong had said. He added: "If Pei Gong had not first broken the Guanzhong troops, could you have entered?

translations.chinese: 且人有大功，擊之不祥，不如因善之。」
translations.english: Moreover, when someone has great merit, to attack him is inauspicious. It would be better to take advantage of and reward him."

translations.chinese: 沛公旦日從百餘騎見羽鴻門，謝曰：「臣與將軍戮力攻秦，將軍戰河北，臣戰河南，不自意先入關，能破秦，與將軍復相見。
translations.english: The next morning Pei Gong came with over a hundred cavalry to see Xiang Yu at Hongmen. He apologized: "I and the general joined forces to attack Qin. The general fought north of the Yellow River, I fought south of the Yellow River. I did not expect to enter the passes first and break Qin, then meet the general again.
